short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool that helps work with colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Color Tools" is a powerful and user-friendly Google Chrome extension that helps you easily generate color palettes, pick the perfect color, and create CSS gradients for your website or design project. With its intuitive interface, you can quickly and easily experiment with different color combinations, making it the perfect tool for designers, developers, and anyone who wants to add a touch of color to their online projects. Try it out today and see how it can enhance your workflow and help you create stunning designs with ease.
